meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with horizontal shelves used for storing books.
meanings.sent1: My bookshelves are filled with colorful books.
meanings.sent2: I organized my books neatly on the bookshelves.
meanings.sent3: The bookshelves in the library groaned under the weight of the many books.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast library, with bookshelves stretching endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelves stood tall like guardians of knowledge in the room.

meanings.definition: The shelves on which books are stored.
meanings.sent1: The bookshelves in the bookstore displayed a wide variety of books.
meanings.sent2: She dusted the bookshelves to keep them clean.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to climb the bookshelves and knock down books.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were neatly arranged on the bookshelves of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelves whispered stories of adventures to anyone who listened.
